message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it.  $120 is a good price, but I'm looking to spend a little less.  Would you be willing to go down to $100?  I think it's a fair price considering I'm ready to buy today.

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a little less, but I'm still quite attached to the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get a fantastic deal.
